website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Royal BB450 Hi has a classic high-top style of men’s basketball shoe. It features a blended synthetic mesh upper with breathable leather. The Royal BB4500 Hi basically offers protection for the ankle, feet and great traction for quick actions in the court. All these pros in one shoe and offered at a very low price, no wonder this pair is highly recommended by many users.
pros: The Reebok Royal BB4500 Hi is available in excellent price point
The good ankle support of the Reebok Royal BB4500 Hi was mentioned by most testers
Most users liked the various colorways available
A handful of testers admired the durability of this pair
This sneaker is easy to clean, said many users
The groovy retro look of BB4500 Hi was complimented by most wearers
Most reviewers described their experience while wearing the BB4500 Hi as “comfortable”
Many testers said that this sneaker is true to size
They would recommend this pair to their peers, said many users
cons: Many complained about the narrow width of this pair compared to other Reebok shoes
Some reviewers revealed that this shoe is hard to find
One reviewer did not like the old-fashioned design

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I added a camo shoelace that matches the soul and I get positive comments frequently. The shoe is holding up great and feels like it will continue to do so. Great for casual, walking & weightlifting. There's not enough sole thickness and cushion for the impact from court sports or running however. I paid about $30. That's ridiculously cheap for a long-lasting size 15 casual shoe! I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: JDtruckin

customer_reviews.title: Love them , gonna cop some more
customer_reviews.text: Love these kicks , I wore jordans forever but these right here , caught my eye . These are my new favorite and that high top style has always been my fave. People I know alway giving me props bout them . Gotta keep that shoe game tight . An the price is right
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Rad look and feel but narrow
customer_reviews.text: Man I have no luck with slick retro shoes. No wides in these which are the death of my shoe shopping. Seemed really comfy but way too narrow, my feet would be crying all day. The price is low too and I wanted them for an 80's party but had to return them, luckily Amazon takes care of the customer so I could try other shoes out. Free Returns appreciated here.
customer_reviews.author: pattk77

customer_reviews.title: Cramped toes and no support
customer_reviews.text: I wear normal width shoes, but these are cramped in the toe box. My pinky toes started hurting after a couple days. These definitely are NOT basketball shoes. There is no support in the sole. The quality of the shoe is alright, but the narrow toe box and no support, make these shoes a waste.
customer_reviews.author: sixthecat

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SHOE
customer_reviews.text: They look great and I really like them. I am a basketball coach, and I needed hi-tops to protect my ankles when showing my team certain things on the court. The girls even liked them and they were half the price of every other shoe I was looking at before I bought these. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Weaver

customer_reviews.title: padding in foot ripping up after 1 month of basketball
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great and it fits the foot. My daughter started to get shin splints and told my to feel inside the shoe, I thought there can't be anything wrong these shoes are new right. Boy I was wrong there is a whole in the right shoe were the padding is ripping up and the sole is coming through. My daughter was running on pure rubber we only had these less then 2 months excepted more. I am giving 2 stars because this can happen in mass production but beware that is has happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lawrason

customer_reviews.title: That's tight yo
customer_reviews.text: I consistently have no issues finding shoes that fit my size 11s properly, with a little extra room to allow for foot stretch. In these shoes my toes were right against the wall and to make it worse I found them too narrow in the front, my toes were bunched up and overlapping.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan O'Pinyon

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these sneakers for my dad for father's day, he loves high top sneakers. since he needs support for his ankles these sneakers do it. He was so excited (since he isn't working bc of the current situation ) he's happy with the new sneakers. Will keep a look out for more sneakers like these.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe. Toe is very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The color selection in the larger sizes is not good. Not sure why the availability is poor. The construction and looks of the shoe are very nice. The toe is just very narrow and the limited size selection doesn’t allow to size up or order a wide.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: A nice shoe, but very narrow
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with the shoe when it arrived. I have a narrow foot, and have other Reebok 8 1/2 shoes that fit fine. This shoe is very narrow. You would have to buy it at least 1/2 if not 1 shoe size bigger to accommodate the average foot so the width would work. I rarely return items, but these went back.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoB

customer_reviews.title: I will be ordering the other colors 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I love them i will be ordering more colors...Thanks Amazon😍😍 this picture does no justice the sneaker is way better in person it's not this dark
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Strawder

customer_reviews.title: Cool Camo Look!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love Reebok's, I've been a fan for a long time! These look awesome but unfortunately I had to return them due to medical issues. As far as quality and appearance they were exactly what I wanted, I really like the Camo trim.
customer_reviews.author: 1treasurehunter

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are better than just wearing socks
customer_reviews.text: I've never excelled athletically however, being tall & extremely handsome drew attention from the fact that my looks were not the only thing superior about my overall contribution to my highschool basketball team. Back then, I had dignity & wore respectable footwear like Nikes. Then as the years flew by & my addiction spun further out of control, I ended up in donated rags for clothes from the Salvation Army & these Reeboks which weren't donated but they don't necessarily SCREAM "somebody paid money for these."
customer_reviews.author: David Misell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for these shoes for a long time didn’t know they were on Amazon , the only thing is they are a little small in the width area , I wish they had a wider width . But overall I Really like these shoes .
customer_reviews.author: Rtaylor8802

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for many months and.
customer_reviews.text: You get nike air max quality for a fraction of the cost. As long as you dont have stupid friends that judge you based on what sneakers you wear (Which shouldnt be your friends anyway). this is a great pair of sneakers. Super comfortable and pretty light.
customer_reviews.author: Shehan

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight, cool design. Underrated brand.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, are very lightweight and this is one of the coolest designs I have seen. There are about a dozen others for this model too. Very cool. Reebok is a very underrated brand. Definitely worth owning.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: CANT SEND BACK.....
customer_reviews.text: WAY TOO SMALL!!!! had them checked. they are a size 9......
customer_reviews.author: Larry Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Small toe box but good overall
customer_reviews.text: A little more narrow than standard sizing. The toe box is definitely smaller than standard sizing. They’ll be fine once broken in. I use them as a fashion shoe. Definitely wouldn’t wear them to play ball.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Thoresen

customer_reviews.title: Choosy mothers choose Reebok...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers for my son. I got the gray color. Very good quality, color and size fit him perfectly. He is picky about his sneakers and he was very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Luckette

customer_reviews.title: Okay but ran small
customer_reviews.text: Not as i expected. Brought this for my older son but gave it to my teenager because it ran small in size. It does look and feel great but upsetting that it didnt fit as expected. Also one of the straps was riped when received.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Buy from a different seller
customer_reviews.text: I guess the shoes are ok but my problem is with the seller. I ordered a pair of 8.5 for my son when they came in they were 7.5. I thought that I made a mistake ordering them so I thought my fault. I ordered a second pair of 8.5 checked my order twice. We received the second pair today and they were 7.5 again. Now we have two pairs that don't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small.
customer_reviews.text: They run a little small and narrow. And its not a big deal, but its always inconvienent when you notice it, the laces are pretty short. I always use the extra hole at the top so having short laces sucks for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Pablo DeBois

customer_reviews.title: Bad lace holes and not long enough
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the length of the shoe strings and the holes for the shoe strings are very tiny and hard to put lace through. Only thing bad about them . Otherwise would give them a 5 star, nice looking and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful shoes, but in my case I have a very wide foot and 10.5 I was very tight and 11 already was very long, it hurts because they are very beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Fifo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend as he completely blew his last pair out lol! He loves them. Says they're super comfy and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Time for an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a sneaker head, but these were a replacement to a reebok shoe I've had for eons and couldnt find again. Hate to see my old ones go, but love these new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shanta K.

customer_reviews.title: High Top Royal Blue Reebok Sneaker are the best all around shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dogs with the Reebok's. I walk to the bus stop, they are water resistant, to the morning dew and moisture on the morning grass just an all around really good sneaker (high top).

customer_reviews.title: Keep them clean, spot clean them
customer_reviews.text: My Baby use them for school he loves them. They are comfortable for his feet his flat footed

customer_reviews.title: Size runs true
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit - size 11 runs true. Not as comfortable as the Adidas cloudfoam but I could switch the inserts if I like.

customer_reviews.title: Reebok classic sneakers

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Slightly narrow but not as bad as the other bb shoes by this brand and others. For the price its a good general gym utility shoe for days im not squatting or dead lifting so i dont wreck my power lifting shoes. Not as stiff as higher end bb shoes but still provides lateral stability

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman’s 8 so a 7.5 men’s fit perfect. Recovering from an ankle fracture, this shoe gave my ankle a little extra support. Stylish and comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY...YOU'LL BE SORRY!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a joke...they look like reeboks of old but are cheaply made and low quality. The soles are thin and the shoes are very uncomfortable. Reeboks used to be a high end brand, but apparently not anymore!! DO NOT BUY!!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've had three pairs of this model shoe. Each one has held up no matter what. You can get years of use out of these.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish classic but narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look and the fact Reebok is still making this classic style. I wish they made bigger widths. Had to go up a size and they still feel slightly tight at the bottom of the laces. I know the discomfort will relax as I brake them in. My old pair has lasted a long time (about 8 or 9 years if I remember correctly).

customer_reviews.title: Old school flavor
customer_reviews.text: Bring me back to the old school days. When I use to wear Reebok often

customer_reviews.title: Size up 1/2 size.. great shoe

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Royal Bb4500 Hi2 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons: athletes wanted to run faster. In the 90s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first running shoes with spikes. Until 1895 he worked by hand for high level runners and long ago his new company, j.W. Foster and Föhn, has developed international customers of renowned athletes.
